result.arabic_text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ بَشَرٗا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبٗا وَصِهۡرٗاۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرٗا
result.translation: It is He Who created human beings from water[30], then made between them bonds of kinship and marriage, for your Lord is Most Capable.
result.footnotes: [30] i.e., the zygote (the mixture of sperm and egg).
